message: Life is too short to wear boring clothes. I believe in living boldly, embracing every moment with confidence and grace. Whether I’m strolling by a fountain at night or exploring a new city, I carry my style and spirit with me. Fashion isn’t just about looking good—it’s about feeling empowered. I love discovering new trends, supporting local brands, and capturing memories through my lens. Here’s to chasing dreams, making memories, and always staying true to who you are.
cn_prompt: 画面中的角色站在喷泉前，身着白色露肩短裙，手提购物袋，正在唱歌。
en_prompt: The character in the scene stands in front of a fountain, wearing a white off-the-shoulder mini dress, holding a shopping bag, singing.
